docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
TaskPoet is a TaskWarrior inspired task manager. We aim to be easy to use from the CLI, but also pretty, focusing on TUI elements from the amazing Charm.sh folks.

Key reasons why this exists:

  • Focus on aesthetics, even though this is a CLI app.
  • Implement Tom Limoncellis Impact vs Effort chart, as a core component.
  • Plugable frameworks to allow for unrelated task sources.
  • It's fun to make! 😁

We are Poets here, not Warriors.

docs.title: Download Binary
docs.text: Download the appropriate binary from the Releases page

docs.title: Themes
docs.text:
Themes are currenty a work in progress. Right now there are 3 themes:

  • Default - No real colors, just default text
  • Solarized Light - Optimized for light backgrounds
  • Solarized Dark - Optimized for dark backgrounds

Set the theme in your ~/.taskpoet.yaml with:

theme: solarized-light
